entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -21.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 12:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -21.8°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -25.9°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm in areas south of Fort McMurray. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
